features: Hard-working, non-drying soap for busy hands
Hand soap made with essential oils, aloe vera, olive oil, and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients
Garden-fresh lemon verbena hand soap has a light, refreshingly mild citrus fragrance
Thoughtfully chosen ingredients with no parabens, phthalates , or artificial colors
Mrs. Meyer's produces cruelty free hand soaps. None of our products are tested on animals
body.description: Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day hand soaps are specifically made to clean and freshen hands without over drying, while also providing a special, singular scent for your home. Lemon Verbena scented soap has a light, refreshingly mild citrus fragrance. This tender herb blossoms in early summer and smells bright and new through and through. This hardworking hand soap formula contains olive oil, aloe vera, and essential oils, and thoughtfully chosen ingredients that clean and freshen hands. Made without parabens, phthalates or animal-derived ingredients and always a cruelty-free formula soap. Also available in other garden-inspired scents and products such as Dish Soap and Multi-Surface Cleaner. Mrs. Meyer’s – Rooted in Goodness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Making The World a More Greener Place One Garden At A Time Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day products are inspired by the garden, which is why we’re inspired to plant flowers, plants and trees. At Mrs. Meyer’s, we have a passion for the environment. We also know the importance of being a good neighbor in our home, our community and our world. That’s why we’ve made a commitment to improving the earth one flower, plant and tree at a time through our campaigns, partnerships, volunteering efforts and donations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Zesty, Eco-Friendly, and Long-Lasting Delight!
reviews.reviewText: Mrs. Meyer's Hand Soap Refill in the delightful Lemon Verbena scent has truly become a staple in my home. This product has exceeded my expectations in every way, and I can't help but share my enthusiasm through this glowing review.First and foremost, the scent of Lemon Verbena is simply divine. It's not overpowering but offers a refreshing and invigorating aroma that lingers on your hands long after you've washed them. The natural fragrance derived from essential oils adds a touch of luxury to an everyday task like handwashing. It's like a mini spa experience every time I use it.One of the standout features of this hand soap refill is its commitment to eco-friendliness. Knowing that it's made with essential oils and boasts a biodegradable formula gives me peace of mind. I feel good about using a product that not only cares for my hands but also cares for the environment. In today's world, where sustainability is paramount, Mrs. Meyer's Hand Soap Refill is a shining example of responsible consumerism.The generous 33 fl. oz. size is another reason I adore this product. It lasts for a long time, reducing the frequency of refills. This not only saves money but also minimizes waste. It's a win-win situation, and I appreciate that the brand has taken this practical approach to packaging.In terms of performance, this hand soap leaves my hands feeling clean, soft, and moisturized. It effectively removes dirt and impurities without stripping away natural oils. Even during the dry winter months, I haven't experienced any issues with dry or cracked skin after using this soap regularly. That's a testament to the thoughtful formulation.To sum it up, Mrs. Meyer's Hand Soap Refill in Lemon Verbena is a product that ticks all the boxes for me. Its captivating scent, eco-conscious ingredients, long-lasting value, and excellent hand-cleaning capabilities make it a must-have in any household. It's a product that not only serves its primary purpose but also aligns with my values as a responsible consumer. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for a hand soap that's both effective and environmentally friendly. Give it a try, and I'm sure you'll fall in love with it, just like I did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Experience the Essence of Cleanliness and Comfort
reviews.reviewText: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Liquid Hand Soap isn't just any soap; it's a testament to the harmony of efficiency and nature. I've found a unique and economical way to use this product in my simplehuman hands-free foam soap dispenser. By mixing 3/4 water to 1/4 of this soap and shaking it well, it creates a luxurious foam that's both gentle on the skin and delightfully aromatic.### Key Features- Natural ingredients for safe and gentle use.- Versatile for use in foam dispensers when diluted.- Rich lathering action, perfect for thorough cleansing.- Eco-friendly packaging and ingredients.### Pros- Effective in small quantities, ideal for foam dispensers.- Delightful scent that lingers, enhancing the handwashing experience.- Economical, as the dilution method extends product life.- Gentle on the skin, making it suitable for frequent use.### Cons- Requires dilution for use in specific foam dispensers.- The scent, while pleasant, may be strong for some users.### ConclusionMrs. Meyer's Clean Day Liquid Hand Soap offers more than just cleanliness. It's an eco-friendly, skin-loving solution that brings a burst of nature into your daily routine. With its cost-effective application in foam dispensers, this soap is a smart choice for those seeking both sustainability and luxury in their handwashing experience. Elevate your hand hygiene with this delightful and effective soap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very good soap with mild fragrance and easy on the skin!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been a fan of this hand soap for a while as it's known to be made with a combination of natural flavoring ingredients and some amount of chemicals...I feel like when it comes to the soap sometimes less chemicals is better but cleaning is also important and this hand soap fits right in.It has a very mild fragrance of citrus, lemon grass and olive oil combination which is not super empowering but at the same time you can definitely smell it all; it lingers for sometime. The soap itself is a mild cleaner and does not lather a whole lot may be because it is made with more of the natural ingredients but is easy on your hands without making it dry and rough....I actually feel my hands are softer and smoother after using it with a refreshing scent on the hands.We have 4 bathrooms in our house and kids go through a lot of hand soap especially during the COVID time where hand cleaning was at paramount...I was looking for an alternate option and came across this product in the 33 FL OZ package; so I immediately grabbed it as it was on a special. I usually refill the smaller bottles with this soap and use a little hack to limit the amount of soap dispensed from the soap pump. I use a rubber band on the neck of the pump to limit the amount of soap that is dispensed whenpumped; if I put the rubber band on the top, it dispenses very little and if you slide it down the neck, it dispenses more. This little hack comes very handy with little kids to prevent wastage as some of these soap dispensers pump too much soap and a vast majority of it ends up in the sink but little hack makes each hand soap last twice as longer.One more thing is that this soap when dispensed is like a glob and takes couple small rubs with each of your palms to dissolve and make lather; if you rub too fast, it may just slide off into the sink.Highly recommend this soap for it's natural ingredients, bio-degradable nature and the volume savings it offers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have consistently chosen Mrs. Meyer's Liquid Hand Soap Refill for several years, and I must assert that it stands as the best hand soap available in the market. The fragrance is pleasing, and the rich foam enhances the overall handwashing experience. The consistently high quality of this product continues to impress me. While the price may be slightly higher compared to other soap options, the unparalleled quality it provides makes it an investment well worth considering, and one that is challenging to surpass by any competing product
Es realmente bueno y deja un buen aroma
No more fancy, expensive, nice smelling hand detergents, this one is IT!
Excelente producto sin químicos que dañan y resecan las manos y agradable olor

reviews.reviewTitle: A quality product at good value
reviews.reviewText: A good hand detergent used at our washroom sinks. Pleasant smell and works well.
